sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Search, Filter, Plus, Edit, Trash2, MapPin, Phone, Mail, Calendar, Store, Star, CheckCircle, AlertTriangle, Clock } from 'lucide-react'; const EstablishmentManagement = () => { const [searchTerm, setSearchTerm] = useState(''); const [filterStatus, setFilterStatus] = useState('all'); const [showAddModal, setShowAddModal] = useState(false); const establishments = [ { id: 1, name: 'Golden Palace Restaurant', type: 'Restaurant', owner: 'Rajesh Kumar', location: 'Mumbai Central', phone: '+91 98765 43210', email: 'contact@goldenpalace.com', licenseNumber: 'FL-2024-001', rating: 'B+', status: 'Active', lastInspection: '2024-01-15', nextInspection: '2024-04-15', violations: 2, category: 'Fine Dining' }, { id: 2, name: 'Fresh Foods Mart', type: 'Grocery Store', owner: 'Priya Sharma', location: 'Pune Station Road', phone: '+91 87654 32109', email: 'info@freshfoods.com', licenseNumber: 'FL-2024-002', rating: 'A', status: 'Active', lastInspection: '2024-01-10', nextInspection: '2024-04-10', violations: 0, category: 'Retail Food' }, { id: 3, name: 'Spice Garden Cafe', type: 'Cafe', owner: 'Amit Patel', location: 'Nashik Highway', phone: '+91 76543 21098', email: 'hello@spicegarden.com', licenseNumber: 'FL-2024-003', rating: 'A', status: 'Active', lastInspection: '2024-01-08', nextInspection: '2024-04-08', violations: 0, category: 'Quick Service' }, { id: 4, name: 'Street Food Corner', type: 'Food Stall', owner: 'Mohammed Ali', location: 'Thane Market', phone: '+91 65432 10987', email: 'streetfood@gmail.com', licenseNumber: 'FL-2024-004', rating: 'C', status: 'Under Review', lastInspection: '2024-01-20', nextInspection: '2024-02-20', violations: 5, category: 'Street Vendor' } ]; const filteredEstablishments = establishments.filter(establishment => { const matchesSearch = establishment.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || establishment.owner.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()) || establishment.location.toLowerCase().includes(searchTerm.toLowerCase()); const matchesFilter = filterStatus === 'all' || establishment.status.toLowerCase() === filterStatus; return matchesSearch && matchesFilter; }); const getRatingColor = (rating) => { switch (rating) { case 'A': return 'bg-green-100 text-green-800'; case 'B+': case 'B': return 'bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800'; case 'C': case 'D': return 'bg-red-100 text-red-800'; default: return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800'; } }; const getStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'Active': return 'badge-success'; case 'Under Review': return 'badge-warning'; case 'Suspended': return 'badge-danger'; default: return 'badge-info'; } }; return (
{/* Header */}

Food Establishment Management

Manage and monitor registered food establishments

{/* Search and Filter */}
setSearchTerm(e.target.value)} />
{/* Establishments Grid */}
{filteredEstablishments.map((establishment) => (

{establishment.name}

{establishment.type}

{establishment.rating} {establishment.status}
{establishment.location}
{establishment.phone}
{establishment.email}
License: {establishment.licenseNumber}
Last Inspection: {establishment.lastInspection}
Violations: 0 ? 'text-red-600' : 'text-green-600'}`}> {establishment.violations}
))}
{/* Summary Stats */}

{establishments.length}

Total Establishments

{establishments.filter(e => e.status === 'Active').length}

Active

{establishments.filter(e => e.status === 'Under Review').length}

Under Review

{establishments.reduce((sum, e) => sum + e.violations, 0)}

Total Violations

); }; export default EstablishmentManagement;
